Literature.Title: Derivatives of the antimicrobial peptide BP100 for expression in plant systems.
Literature.Author: Badosa E, Moiset G, Montesinos L, Talleda M, Bardají E, Feliu L, Montesinos E, Planas M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:74% Hemolysis=50 µM,Human erythrocytes:81% Hemolysis=150 µM,Human erythrocytes:83% Hemolysis=250 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Xanthomonas campestris pv. Vesicatoria 2133-2(MIC=1.25-2.5µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae EPS 94(MIC=7.5-10µM),Erwinia amylovora PMV 6076(MIC=>20µM)
